A while ago, I posted my startup here, BackendLab, which was in public beta at the time. I had a lot of very valuable feedback from this community, and have pivoted the product slightly since thenI just launched the first official release of BackendLab, which is now taking paid subscriptions.I'm also offering an introductory 50% discount on the pro plans for the first year - details can be found on the Product Hunt page here:
https://www.producthunt.com/posts/backendlab-betaThanks for looking!
Chris
